sentences.en: ...Stonehenge, in southwestern England, an ancient configuration of giant stones.
sentences.cn: …史前巨石柱群，位于英国西南部，是一座古代巨石阵列。

sentences.en: A transient application should launch to its previous position and configuration.
sentences.cn: 运行暂时应用时,它应该处于上一次的位置和配置状态下.
要把命令和设置区别开来.

sentences.en: For some remote systems, the translation of configuration information into machine language.
sentences.cn: 对于某些远程系统, 将配置信息翻译成机器语言的过程.

sentences.en: Geographers study the configuration of the mountains.
sentences.cn: 地理学家研究山脉的地形轮廓.

sentences.en: Historically, the supply curve of hours has followed this configuration.
sentences.cn: 在历史上, 工时的供给曲线是符合这种形状的.

sentences.en: In the process the magnetic field structure relaxes to a lower - energy configuration .
sentences.cn: 在这个过程中,磁场结构松弛到 低能量 状态.

sentences.en: Prices range from $119 to $199, depending on the particular configuration.
sentences.cn: 价格因具体配置而异，从119美元至199美元不等。

sentences.en: Some teletypes are equipped with EIA - RS 232 C in a serial configuration.
sentences.cn: 有些电传打字机用EIA-RS232C装备成串行方式.

sentences.en: The amount of fluctuation is also affected by bed configuration.
sentences.cn: 变化的幅度也受河床形状的影响.

sentences.en: The conical configuration of the appendix makes obstruction of the lumen unlikely.
sentences.cn: 阑尾呈圆锥形,不易造成腔内梗阻.

sentences.en: The elevation and configuration of the launch pad also require consideration.
sentences.cn: 提升机和发射台的外形也需要考虑.

sentences.en: The potential energy is energy the system possesses by virtue of its configuration.
sentences.cn: 势能是体系由于它的相对位置而具有的能.

sentences.en: The term configuration describes moving, adding, or deleting persistent objects.
sentences.cn: 术语“配置”概括了移动 、 添加或者删除持久对象.

sentences.en: Those with a random distribution of configuration are termed atactic.
sentences.cn: 构型无规分布的聚合物叫无规聚合物.

sentences.en: We can elaborate the electronic configuration for the atoms in the periodic chart.
sentences.cn: 我们能够精心安排周期表中原子的电子排布.

words.tran_cn: 结构的；构形的；外形的；组态的
使…成形；按特定形式装配（configure的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 配置文件；设定档（configuration file的复数形式）
配置管理器；组态管理员
位形空间，构形空间；配置空间
n. 电子构型；电子排布
存储器配置；存储器格局
标准配置；标准安装；标准设备配备

trans.tran_en: the shape or arrangement of the parts of something
